recipesJson.name: Creme de la Stachio
recipesJson.author: Kendallvapes
recipesJson.description: Started working on a clone for creme de la creme and while making a few mixes I decided to try and sub out for a different nut. The pistachio works so well with the creams and caramel. Dropped the coffee note as that didn't play as well with the pistachio, but this is a rich, slightly nutty caramel cream that is delicious after a week steep.
